hero.title: Discover Art Through
hero.subtitle: A community where art appreciation emerges from genuine peer relationships, not algorithms. Explore artworks in depth and see how peers interact with them.
hero.trust1Desc: Human moderators ensure authenticity before artists can publish
hero.trust2Desc: See what trusted connections appreciate, not just popularity counts
hero.trust3Desc: Recommendations explained by relationships, not opaque scores
hero.ctaSubtitle: Dive into the full marketplace to explore hundreds of pieces and follow the artists that inspire you most.

login.title: Welcome back
login.description: Sign in to your account to continue
login.demoDesc: Unlocks moderator flow: approve artist applications on the Moderation page.

moderation.title: Moderation
moderation.description: Learn how content is reviewed and how we handle reports from the community. Ethical moderation helps keep Atelier a place for meaningful interaction and trust.
moderation.demoBlock: Artist applications are reviewed by the moderation team. Judges: sign in with the demo moderator account (demo@email.com / demo) to try approving applications.
moderation.artistApplicationsDesc: Approve or reject requests from users who want to register as artists. Approved users can post artworks and see who liked and commented on their work.

discover.title: Discover Art
discover.description: Artworks validated by your peers and the wider community. Every piece comes with context about why it resonates.
discover.subtitle: Explore artworks validated by your peers and the wider community. Every piece comes with context about why it resonates.
discover.noResultsHint: Try adjusting your filters or search terms

recommendation.sectionTitle: Why We Think You'll Appreciate These
recommendation.sectionDesc: Every recommendation comes with context. We believe you deserve to know why something is suggested, not just what.
recommendation.card1Explanation: Several artists you follow have engaged with similar abstract expressionist styles. These pieces share emotional qualities with works you've appreciated before.
recommendation.card2Explanation: Long-term community members with similar tastes have recently discovered these emerging artists. Their engagement suggests authentic appreciation.
recommendation.card3Explanation: Based on the 'minimalism' keyword in artworks you've liked, here are pieces that explore similar aesthetic principles from diverse perspectives.

artists.title: Artists
artists.sectionDesc: Every artist is verified by human moderators before publishing. Reputation builds through consistent quality and peer recognition.
artists.subtitle: Browse verified artists. Everyone here has been reviewed by moderators. Reputation grows through peer recognition and consistent quality.
artists.noMatchHint: Try different search terms or clear filters to see all verified artists.

principles.sectionDesc: We believe art communities deserve better than engagement-maximizing algorithms. Here's what guides us.
principles.card1Desc: Our AI helps surface patterns and connections, but human judgement remains central. Trust emerges from real relationships.
principles.card2Desc: Every recommendation and trust signal comes with an explanation. No opaque algorithms—you always know why.
principles.card3Desc: We encourage learning and dialogue about art, not financial speculation. Value comes from meaning, not markets.
principles.card4Desc: Our system actively preserves emerging and minority artistic voices, preventing any single group from dominating visibility.

artworkCard.signInToLike: Sign in to like and save artworks
artworkCard.toastSignInFavorites: Please sign in to save favorites
artworkCard.toastSignInLike: Please sign in to like artworks

notFound.heading: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Curated sets of artworks organized by themes, moods, and stories. Each collection is handpicked by verified community curators.
collections.noCollections: No collections found matching your criteria.

digital-frontiers.title: Digital Frontiers
digital-frontiers.description: Where technology meets creativity. A journey through digital art that pushes boundaries.

whispers-of-nature.title: Whispers of Nature
whispers-of-nature.description: Organic forms and natural beauty. Art that speaks to the soul of the wilderness.

abstract-horizons.title: Abstract Horizons
abstract-horizons.description: Bold shapes and vibrant colors. Abstract art that challenges perception.

urban-dreams.title: Urban Dreams
urban-dreams.description: Cityscapes and street life. The poetry of concrete and neon.

human-condition.title: The Human Condition
human-condition.description: Portraits and figures that explore identity, emotion, and connection.

quiet-moments.title: Quiet Moments
quiet-moments.description: Minimal and meditative. Art that finds beauty in stillness.

trending.title: Trending
trending.description: See what the community is engaging with the most. Unlike viral content elsewhere, these trends are based on
trending.rankedBy: Ranked by peer appreciation & trust signals
trending.noArtworks: No trending artworks for this timeframe yet.
trending.noArtists: No trending artists for this timeframe yet.
trending.noKeywords: No trending keywords for this timeframe yet.
trending.howItWorksIntro: Our trending algorithm prioritizes quality over virality. Instead of simply counting likes, we weight engagement based on:
trending.peerValidationText: Appreciation from verified artists and long-term community members carries more weight.
trending.curatorEndorsementsText: Works featured in peer-curated collections signal trusted quality.
trending.organicGrowthText: Steady, sustained engagement is valued over sudden spikes that may indicate manipulation.

collectionDetail.featuredDesc: A selection of artworks from this collection. Browse all {{count}} works on Discover.

community.title: Built on trust, not likes
community.subtitle: Atelier is a community-driven art platform. Discovery is shaped by your network, peer endorsements, and transparent reputation—not engagement-maximizing algorithms.
community.howInteractDesc: Social validation, peer learning, and community-driven trust are at the heart of Atelier. Here's how you participate.
community.followArtistsDesc: Build your network by following artists you admire. Your feed and recommendations are shaped by who you follow.
community.likeCommentDesc: Engage with artworks and artists. Your likes and comments support creators and help peers discover work.
community.stayLoopDesc: Get notified when someone likes your work, comments, or follows you. Respond and build real connections.
community.peerEndorsementsDesc: Discover through endorsements from verified artists. See why work is recommended—linked to people you trust.
community.communityCurationDesc: Explore collections curated by verified community curators. Themes, moods, and stories—all peer-driven.
community.trustSignalsDesc: See reputation and peer validation on artists and artworks. We surface why something is trusted, not just popularity.
community.trustOverPopDesc: Recommendations come from your network and verified curators, not opaque engagement metrics.
community.peerLearningDesc: Artists endorse each other. Discover work through genuine appreciation and shared practice.
community.explainableSignalsDesc: We show why an artist or artwork is suggested—linked to people you follow and trust.
community.peerVoicesDesc: Artists recommend each other. Here's what the community is saying.
community.joinDesc: Follow artists, explore trusted recommendations, and discover work through people you admire.

signupArtist.title: Register as an artist
signupArtist.description: Create an account and submit a request to become an artist. A moderator will review and approve your request. Once approved, you can post artworks and see who liked and commented on your work.
signupArtist.toastPasswordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
signupArtist.toastSuccess: Account created! Your artist request has been sent for moderator approval. We'll notify you once approved.

artistRegistration.title: Become an Artist
artistRegistration.subtitle: Submit your portfolio to join our community of verified artists
artistRegistration.specialtyPlaceholder: e.g., Contemporary Painting, Digital Art, Sculpture
artistRegistration.specialtyHint: Describe your primary artistic medium or style
artistRegistration.bioPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself, your artistic journey, and what inspires your work...
artistRegistration.portfolioHint: Submit at least 3 portfolio pieces to demonstrate your artistic work
artistRegistration.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe this piece, your inspiration, techniques used...
artistRegistration.disclaimer: By submitting, you agree that your portfolio will be reviewed by our moderation team. We typically review applications within 2-3 business days.
artistRegistration.pendingDesc: Your portfolio is under review. We typically review applications within 2 to 3 business days.
artistRegistration.pendingEmail: Please look out for an email notification once a decision has been made.
artistRegistration.approvedDesc: Congratulations! You can now post artworks and manage your artist profile.
artistRegistration.toastBio: Please provide a bio of at least 50 characters
artistRegistration.toastPortfolio: Please provide at least 3 portfolio pieces with title and image
artistRegistration.toastSuccess: Portfolio submitted successfully! Review typically takes 2-3 business days. Please check your email for updates.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.intro: Learn how to participate respectfully and constructively in the Atelier community. These guidelines support social validation, peer learning, and community-driven trust.
guidelines.respectfulContent: Treat artists, collectors, and curators with respect. Constructive feedback and genuine appreciation build the community. Harassment, hate speech, or personal attacks are not tolerated.
guidelines.constructiveContent: Comments and endorsements should be thoughtful and relevant. Share what you appreciate about the work or how it resonates with you. Peer learning thrives when conversations are substantive.
guidelines.trustTransparencyContent: We surface peer endorsements, reputation, and trust signals so you can make informed choices. Do not manipulate engagement, fake endorsements, or misrepresent your identity or work.
guidelines.reportingContent: If you see content or behaviour that violates these guidelines, report it. We review reports and take action to keep the community safe. See our Moderation and Trust & Safety pages for how we handle reports.
guidelines.artAuthenticityContent: We encourage participation without turning art into a purely speculative asset. Share and discover work you value. Community-driven trust and social validation matter more than raw popularity.
guidelines.enforceIntro: For how we enforce these guidelines and keep the platform safe, see:

trustPage.title: Trust & Safety
trustPage.intro: How we keep Atelier safe, transparent, and respectful for artists and collectors. Social trust and community-driven validation are at the core of what we do.
trustPage.socialGraphsContent: Recommendations are shaped by who you follow and who endorses what. We model influence and connections so discovery reflects your network and trusted peers—not raw engagement metrics.
trustPage.peerTrustContent: We prioritise social validation and community-driven trust. Recommendations and visibility are shaped by your network, peer endorsements, and transparent reputation—not opaque engagement metrics.
trustPage.reputationContent: Artists and artworks carry trust signals: peer validation, endorsements from verified artists, and reputation (established, rising, newcomer). We show why something is suggested so you can decide what to explore.
trustPage.expertEndorsementContent: Artists endorse each other; curators create collections. Endorsement signals help you discover work through people you follow and trust. We encourage participation without reducing art to a purely speculative asset.
trustPage.transparencyContent: We explain why an artist or artwork appears in Discover or Trending—linked to peers who liked it, curators who featured it, or trust scores. You see the reasoning behind recommendations.
trustPage.safetyRespectContent: We keep Atelier safe and respectful for artists and collectors. Content and behaviour are moderated in line with our Community Guidelines. Reports are reviewed and action is taken to protect the community.
trustPage.ethicalModerationContent: Moderation is consistent, transparent, and aligned with our values. We balance free expression with safety and respect. See our Moderation page for how we review content and handle reports.
trustPage.participateIntro: To participate in the community and understand how we moderate content:

moderationPage.principle1: Consistent: same standards applied to everyone
moderationPage.principle2: Transparent: we explain how we review and act
moderationPage.principle3: Safety over engagement: we never favour engagement over safety
moderationPage.ethicalModerationContent: We moderate content to keep the community safe and respectful while preserving free expression. Our approach is consistent, transparent, and aligned with our Community Guidelines. We do not favour engagement over safety.
moderationPage.howReviewedContent: Reports from the community are reviewed by our team. We consider context, intent, and impact. Action may include a warning, content removal, or account restrictions. We aim to be fair and proportionate.
moderationPage.howToReportContent: Use the Report button on artwork and artist profile pages. Choose a reason (harassment, hate speech, misrepresentation, manipulation, or other) and add a brief description so we can act appropriately. Reports are reviewed by our team.
moderationPage.appealsContent: If you believe a decision was made in error, you can appeal. We will re-review the case and respond. Our goal is a community where artists and collectors can participate without abuse or manipulation.
moderationPage.contactContent: For urgent safety concerns or questions about moderation, contact us through the Contact page. We take safety seriously and aim to respond to reports in a timely manner.
moderationPage.alignmentTrustContent: Moderation supports social validation and community-driven trust. By addressing harmful behaviour, we protect the space for peer learning, endorsements, and genuine engagement. Art stays about appreciation, not speculation or abuse.
moderationPage.appealIntro: If you believe a moderation decision was made in error, you can appeal. We will re-review the case and respond.
moderationPage.appealWhy: Why do you believe the decision was wrong? (required)
moderationPage.appealPlaceholder: Provide details so we can re-review fairly.
moderationPage.communityIntro: For community norms and how we build trust:
moderationPage.toastAppealDesc: Please describe why you believe the decision was wrong.
moderationPage.toastAppealSuccess: Appeal submitted. We will re-review the case and respond.
moderationPage.toastAppealFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again.

about.title: About Atelier
about.intro: Atelier is a community-driven art platform built on trust, transparency, and genuine appreciation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Get in touch with the Atelier team for questions, feedback, or support. For urgent safety concerns or questions about moderation, choose Safety / Moderation—we take safety seriously and aim to respond to reports in a timely manner.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.toastSuccess: Message sent. We aim to respond in a timely manner, especially for safety and moderation concerns.
contact.toastFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Answers to common questions about using Atelier. We build trust through community-driven discovery and ethical moderation.
faq.q1: How does discovery work on Atelier?
faq.a1: Discovery is community-driven: we surface art based on your network, peer endorsements, and transparent reputation—not opaque engagement metrics. Artists are verified by human moderators before publishing. You see why something is recommended (e.g. who endorsed it, who liked it).
faq.a2: Use Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac) to open search. Use Ctrl+Shift+H (or Cmd+Shift+H on Mac) to go to the home page.
faq.q3: How do I report content or behaviour?
faq.a3: Use the Report button on artwork and artist profile pages. Choose a reason (e.g. harassment, hate speech, misrepresentation) and add details. Reports are reviewed by our team. See the Moderation page for more.
faq.q4: How do I appeal a moderation decision?
faq.a4: Go to the Moderation page and use the "Submit an appeal" form. We will re-review the case and respond.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.intro: Learn how your data is used and protected when you use Atelier.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: The rules and conditions for using Atelier.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.intro: Information about how cookies are used on Atelier.

principlesPage.title: Ethical Principles
principlesPage.intro: The values that guide how Atelier is built and how the community operates.

footer.tagline: A community-driven art platform built on trust, transparency, and genuine appreciation.
